about_the_game:
It is a first-person horror game. It is played in a palace called Yeongyeong in Korea. (The palace is customized and not perfectly matched.)

If there are no abnormalities, approach the species.

If you have any abnormalities, approach the soldier at the door.

If you succeed in the correct approach, you will go from 0 o'clock to 1 o'clock, and if you get it wrong, you will go back to 0 o'clock unconditionally.

The map changes automatically at the same time as the time changes.

Clear if you survive from 0:00 to 6:00.

The game is only for walking and running forward.

(There are a total of 20 anomalies.)
detailed_description:
It is a first-person horror game. It is played in a palace called Yeongyeong in Korea. (The palace is customized and not perfectly matched.)

If there are no abnormalities, approach the species.

If you have any abnormalities, approach the soldier at the door.

If you succeed in the correct approach, you will go from 0 o'clock to 1 o'clock, and if you get it wrong, you will go back to 0 o'clock unconditionally.

The map changes automatically at the same time as the time changes.

Clear if you survive from 0:00 to 6:00.

The game is only for walking and running forward.

(There are a total of 20 anomalies.)
name: Yeonkyung

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 / AMD Ryzen 7 5700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI / AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Please understand that the capacity is high for quality.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI / Radeon Vega 8 Graphics
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X Compatible
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Please understand that the capacity is high for quality.

short_description: The game is a 3D first-person horror game and features Korean and Japanese soldiers and is played in a place called Yeongyeong, the palace of the Goryeo Dynasty. (Please understand that the game size is high for quality reasons.)
